mapper.select: SELECT m.* from weiit_merchant m inner join weiit_shop s on m.mrch_id = s.mrch_id WHERE s.shop_id = #{shop_id}

SELECT id, id AS validate_id, intro_page_url, intro_page_desc, is_use, create_time, shop_id from weiit_weixin_mini_intropage WHERE shop_id = #{shop_id} and is_delete = 0 order by is_use DESC, create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weiit_weixin_public_info (authorizer_id, authorizer_app_id, authorizer_fresh_token, alias, head_img, nick_name, principal_name, qrcode_url, service_type_info, signature, user_name, mini_program, create_time, update_time, shop_id) VALUES (#{authorizer_id}, #{authorizer_app_id}, #{authorizer_fresh_token}, #{alias}, #{head_img}, #{nick_name}, #{principal_name}, #{qrcode_url}, #{service_type_info}, #{signature}, #{user_name}, #{mini_program}, now(), now(), #{shop_id})
INSERT INTO weiit_weixin_mini_intropage (intro_page_url, intro_page_desc, create_time, shop_id) VALUES (#{intro_page_url}, #{intro_page_desc}, now(), #{shop_id})
mapper.update: update weiit_weixin_mini_intropage set is_use=0 where is_use = 1 and shop_id = #{shop_id}

update weiit_weixin_public_info set update_time=now(), authorizer_fresh_token=#{authorizer_fresh_token}, alias=#{alias}, head_img=#{head_img}, nick_name=#{nick_name}, principal_name=#{principal_name}, qrcode_url=#{qrcode_url}, service_type_info=#{service_type_info}, signature=#{signature}, user_name=#{user_name}, mini_program=#{mini_program} where authorizer_app_id=#{authorizer_app_id}
and shop_id=#{shop_id}
